scripts.removeDist: echo "Removing Old Dist Folder" & rm -rf dist
scripts.createDist: echo "Create FOLDERS Started ..." & npm run removeDist & npm run makeDist & npm run makeCss & npm run makeImg & npm run makeJs & npm run makePages
scripts.copyImg: echo "Copying Images from DEV to DIST" & cp -rf dev/img/*.jpg dist/img
scripts.copyJs: echo "Copying Javascript from DEV to DIST" && cp -rf dev/js/*.js dist/js
scripts.copyPages: echo "Copying Pages from DEV to DIST" && cp -rf dev/pages/*.html dist/pages
scripts.copyIndex: echo "Copying Index from DEV to DIST" && cp -rf dev/index*.html dist
scripts.copyFiles: echo "Copy FILES Started ..." & npm run copyImg & npm run copyJs & npm run copyPages & npm run copyIndex
scripts.minifyCss: echo "Minifying CSS Started ..." & uglifycss dev/css/main.css > dist/css/main.min.css
scripts.gh-pages: echo "Deploying Project To GH-Pages" && gh-pages -d dist
